<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 11"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Mind's Light Circlet](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2328)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Enchantment" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=61" />
<trait label="Focused" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=74" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Light" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=100" />
<trait label="Occult" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=120" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 150 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 1,200 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn headwear

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Gemstones of many colors adorn the silver of a _mind's light circlet_. When you're charged with mental power, the jewels scintillate with light, with different gems resonating based on your emotions. If you have at least 1 Focus Point, the gems cast [dim light](/Rules.aspx?ID=408) in a 10-foot radius. When you amp a spell, the light increases to [bright light](/Rules.aspx?ID=407) in a 20-foot radius (and dim light to the next 20 feet) until the start of your next turn.

 You gain a +2 item bonus to [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11) checks. You also gain the following [amp](/Traits.aspx?ID=425), which you can apply to any of your psi cantrips that have a target or area, much like an amp gained from a feat.

 **Amp** You transfer some of the magical luminescence from the mind's light circlet to one of the creatures. Choose a creature targeted by the spell or in its area. Until the start of your next turn, that creature sheds bright light in a 20-foot radius (and dim light to the next 20 feet) and can't be [concealed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=4). If the creature is [invisible](/Conditions.aspx?ID=26), it's concealed while alight, rather than being [undetected](/Conditions.aspx?ID=39).

<document level="2" id="action-1882" />

**Craft Requirements** You are a [psychic](/Classes.aspx?ID=21).

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
